name: 逆水寒
description: 从官方下载安装包进行安装。
notes:
已知问题：
　　1. 性能消耗过高。推荐咸鱼版或者超高性能服务器使用。
　　2. 卡顿。任何场景下都会出现卡顿的情况，转向时更严重。
　　3. 无法截图。游戏内截图和拍照无效。
　　4. 非正常转向。在未知情况下（可能是用了拍照后，可能是玩的时间长了之后）会出现鼠标随便移动一点距离画面就旋转一大圈或者镜头向下。
content:
files:
- setup: https://nsh.gdl.netease.com/NGP/NGP_NSH_2.0.5345.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: "drive_c/Netease/\u9006\u6C34\u5BD2\uFF08NGP\u6E38\u620F\u5E73\u53F0\uFF09\
    /out/Release/LootHoarder.exe"
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: "\u521B\u5EFA 64bit Wine prefix."
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows 10 mode for Wine
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win10
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Wine Staging: Enabling DXVA2'
    key: backend
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DXVA2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: "\u5F00\u59CB\u5B89\u88C5\u9006\u6C34\u5BD2 NGP \u5E73\u53F0\n------------------------------"
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: lutris-4.12.1-x86_64
